channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Extra Columns Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Extra Columns Plugin

item.title: CVE-2021-21630|2024-08-03T18:16:23.814Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20extra%20columns%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Extra Columns Plugin 1.22 and earlier does not escape parameter values in the build parameters column, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Job/Configure permission.
